mapper.select:
select
from route_day
del_flg=0
and tabs like "%"#{tabs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by pday
limit #{offset},#{limit};

select count(*) from route_day
del_flg=0
and tabs like "%"#{tabs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
